data.name: Timberman VR - grab an axe, chop trees, beat records!
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT MORE GREAT GAMES!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1019550/Thief_Simulator_VR/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1433570/Car_Detailing_Simulator/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1088770/Car_Mechanic_Simulator_VR/


About the Game

MORE GREAT GAMES:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1024010/Ultimate_Fishing_Simulator_VR/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1839190/House_Flipper_Pets_VR/

Grab your axe and chop down some trees while avoiding the branches. Sounds simple enough, but this doesn’t mean you’re in for an easy task. Show off both your speed and accuracy. Prove your reflexes and steady arm by always cutting tree trunks from the correct side.


Become a true master of your trade by setting records and unlocking new tools. Use your hard-earned points to buy new axes that not only make you look stylish against the cloud of shavings and splinters, but also give you some special bonuses.




Keep a cool head and use your best judgement even in the midst of the busiest logging operation: it’s not just branches that will get in your way. Look out for all the different types of obstacles and wildlife, such as squirrels and wasp nests. Act quickly, be precise, and stay alert!




Enjoy the seasons to the fullest, be it a snowy winter forest, spring in full bloom, or a bit of autumn nostalgia. Just don’t get too distracted by the landscape and the atmosphere: you have trees to cut down and records to beat!

data.short_description: Timberman, the devilishly addictive retro-style arcade video game goes 3D and beyond. It’s now available in VR! Take a deep dive into a game that is easy to learn but not-so-easy to master. Discover whole heaps of fun in a brand new type of reality - a virtual reality!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows(64-bit) 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-7300 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device
